name.description: The name of the package. This must be a unique, lowercase alpha-numeric name without spaces. It may include "." or "_" or "-" characters. It is otherwise opaque.

description.description: A brief description of the package. By convention, the first sentence (up to the first ". ") should be usable as a package title in listings.

version.description: Version string conforming to the Semantic Versioning requirements (http://semver.org/).

keywords.description: An Array of string keywords to assist users searching for the package in catalogs.

maintainers.description: Array of maintainers of the package. Each maintainer is a hash which must have a "name" property and may optionally provide "email" and "web" properties,
